definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
Adventures of Tom Sawyer by Mark Twain 馬克·吐溫|马克·吐温[Ma3 ke4 · Tu3 wen1]
pinyin: Tang1 mu3 · Suo3 ya4 Li4 xian3 Ji4

definition: Adventures of Tom Sawyer by Mark Twain
pinyin: Tang1 mu3 Suo3 ya4 Li4 xian3 Ji4

sentences.english: Tom is an easygoing type of person who gets along well with everyone.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆是那種隨和的人，跟誰都合得來。

sentences.english: Tom's friend said he was a double-tongued liar.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆的朋友說他是個兩面三刀的騙子。

sentences.english: Tom is a short fuse, he has bad temper.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆是個急性子，脾氣不好。

sentences.english: The boss kicked Tom out of the factory.
sentences.chinese: 老闆把湯姆踢出工廠大門。

sentences.english: That thunderstorm the other night frightened little Tom half to death.
sentences.chinese: 前兩天晚上的那場雷雨把小湯姆嚇得半死。

sentences.english: Mary looked at Tom very oddly.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗怪模怪樣地看着湯姆。

sentences.english: I ----- Tom ------- ------ Miss Li's office just now.
sentences.chinese: 我剛纔看到湯姆走進了李老師的辦公室。

sentences.english: Tom, I'm going to keep closer tabs on you.

sentences.chinese: 湯姆把他的筆借給了我。

sentences.english: Tom's classmates wanted him to join the team when the season starts.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆的同學還要他在球季開始時加入球隊。

sentences.english: Of course, I've booked the train tickets now. And Tom's looking forward to it.
sentences.chinese: 當然了，我已經訂了火車票了，而且湯姆也很期待。

sentences.english: Nancy was all smiles when she saw Tom.
sentences.chinese: 南希一見湯姆就滿面笑容。

sentences.english: Then Tom turned coolly away, still talking, and took Amy with him.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆冷冰冰地轉身帶着艾美走了，邊走邊和她談着。

sentences.english: When his father fell ill, Tom rushed home from work.
sentences.chinese: 當爸爸生病，湯姆快速從上班的地方奔回了家。

definition: Werther, opera by Jules Massenet/Werther, German masculine given name
Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
